mapper.select: select dsc.ID , dsc.ALBUMNAME , dsc.PRICE , dsc.IMAGE , dsc.COUNTRY , dsc.ARTIST , dsc.RELEASEYEAR , dsc.STATUS , dsc.PLATFORM , dsc.CATEGORY , dsc.DEMOAUDIO , dsc.STUDIO , dsc.MANUFACTUREYEAR , dsc.STOCKSTATUS , dsc.DESCRIPTION , dsc.MOOD , dsc.QUANTITY , dsc.STOCKQUANTITY FROM DISC dsc WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT dsc.ID , dsc.ALBUMNAME , dsc.PRICE , dsc.IMAGE , dsc.COUNTRY , dsc.ARTIST , dsc.RELEASEYEAR , dsc.STATUS , dsc.PLATFORM , dsc.CATEGORY , dsc.DEMOAUDIO , dsc.STUDIO , dsc.MANUFACTUREYEAR , dsc.STOCKSTATUS , dsc.DESCRIPTION , dsc.MOOD , dsc.QUANTITY , dsc.STOCKQUANTITY FROM DISC dsc WHERE UPPER(dsc.ALBUMNAME) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%')) OR UPPER(dsc.ARTIST) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%')) LIMIT 5

select dsc.ID , dsc.ALBUMNAME , dsc.PRICE , dsc.IMAGE , dsc.COUNTRY , dsc.ARTIST , dsc.RELEASEYEAR , dsc.STATUS , dsc.PLATFORM , dsc.CATEGORY , dsc.DEMOAUDIO , dsc.STUDIO , dsc.MANUFACTUREYEAR , dsc.STOCKSTATUS , dsc.DESCRIPTION , dsc.MOOD , dsc.QUANTITY FROM DISC dsc WHERE 1 = 1 LIMIT 8

SELECT dsc.ID , dsc.ALBUMNAME , dsc.PRICE , dsc.IMAGE , dsc.COUNTRY , dsc.ARTIST , dsc.RELEASEYEAR , dsc.STATUS , dsc.PLATFORM , dsc.CATEGORY , dsc.DEMOAUDIO , dsc.STUDIO , dsc.MANUFACTUREYEAR , dsc.STOCKSTATUS , dsc.DESCRIPTION , dsc.MOOD , dsc.QUANTITY , dsc.STOCKQUANTITY FROM DISC dsc WHERE UPPER(dsc.ALBUMNAME) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%')) OR UPPER(dsc.ARTIST) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%'))

SELECT dsc.ID , dsc.ALBUMNAME , dsc.PRICE , dsc.IMAGE , dsc.COUNTRY , dsc.ARTIST , dsc.RELEASEYEAR , dsc.STATUS , dsc.PLATFORM , dsc.CATEGORY , dsc.DEMOAUDIO , dsc.STUDIO , dsc.MANUFACTUREYEAR , dsc.STOCKSTATUS , dsc.DESCRIPTION , dsc.MOOD , dsc.QUANTITY , dsc.STOCKQUANTITY FROM DISC dsc WHERE UPPER(dsc.ALBUMNAME) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%')) ORDER BY dsc.PRICE ASC

SELECT dsc.ID , dsc.ALBUMNAME , dsc.PRICE , dsc.IMAGE , dsc.COUNTRY , dsc.ARTIST , dsc.RELEASEYEAR , dsc.STATUS , dsc.PLATFORM , dsc.CATEGORY , dsc.DEMOAUDIO , dsc.STUDIO , dsc.MANUFACTUREYEAR , dsc.STOCKSTATUS , dsc.DESCRIPTION , dsc.MOOD , dsc.QUANTITY , dsc.STOCKQUANTITY FROM DISC dsc WHERE UPPER(dsc.ALBUMNAME) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%')) ORDER BY dsc.PRICE DESC

SELECT dsc.ID , dsc.ALBUMNAME , dsc.PRICE , dsc.IMAGE , dsc.COUNTRY , dsc.ARTIST , dsc.RELEASEYEAR , dsc.STATUS , dsc.PLATFORM , dsc.CATEGORY , dsc.DEMOAUDIO , dsc.STUDIO , dsc.MANUFACTUREYEAR , dsc.STOCKSTATUS , dsc.DESCRIPTION , dsc.MOOD , dsc.QUANTITY , dsc.STOCKQUANTITY FROM DISC dsc
AND UPPER(dsc.ALBUMNAME) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%'))
AND UPPER(dsc.CATEGORY) = UPPER(#{categoryName})
AND UPPER(dsc.MOOD) = UPPER(#{moodName})
AND UPPER(dsc.RELEASEYEAR) = UPPER(#{releaseYear})
AND UPPER(dsc.STOCKSTATUS) = UPPER(#{stockStatus})
